stories.text: I've built a widget to help remote teams stay in sync across time zones. It's easy to use, customizable, and you can embed it on your Notion page. Let me know what do you think :)
stories.title: Show HN: Timezone Sync Widget
An app for private period tracking
Potted History – a history of canning food

stories.text:
Specs for this product:

* Will likely store hundreds of millions of rows of financial data of companies

* New data constantly added each day

* Need to aggregate and analyze data to put onto dashboards. Need store results for fast access. Results should be updated whenever need data is added.

* Need to send out email notifications for interesting events after aggregating and analyzing data

This product is bootstrapped - meaning, I have a very low budget.
stories.title: Ask HN: What tools/services would you use for a data-heavy bootstrapped product?
Carbon capture train concept could clean air as it zooms along the tracks
